content: this text is about a legal case in the supreme court of croatia but it does not provide specific details about the parties involved or the case itself it discusses a legal procedure called cost procedure in the first instance which has been ongoing for a certain period of time the final judgment of the case resulted in the division of a joint property specifically an apartment located on the first floor of a building in a specific municipality the apartment has a total area of 4 units and consists of one room a kitchen a bathroom a hallway and a balcony the property was sold through a public auction and the proceeds were divided between the plaintiff and the defendant the decision in the case was based on various articles of the judicial procedure and property acts
